Posted By: Enchantment_Removal (4/27/2012 12:14:30 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Isn't this like a control finisher of choice?  
I mean look at it:  
1. It's big  
2. It's got evasion.  
3. It's got more control built-in with lifegain. This means if necessary, you can make the game last longer.  
4. It's got more control built in with the words "Draw seven cards" This means more board control and counterspells, etc.  
5. 3 fuels 4.  
  
Sure there's an inimidating ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) in the right hand corner, but there are plenty of duel lands available if you want to go ![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) control. It's also Legendary, but you're probably not running 4 of them anyway.  
  
5/5
posts.html:
Isn't this like a control finisher of choice?
I mean look at it:
1. It's big
2. It's got evasion.
3. It's got more control built-in with lifegain. This means if necessary, you can make the game last longer.
4. It's got more control built in with the words "Draw seven cards" This means more board control and counterspells, etc.
5. 3 fuels 4.

Sure there's an inimidating in the right hand corner, but there are plenty of duel lands available if you want to go control. It's also Legendary, but you're probably not running 4 of them anyway.

5/5

posts.post_content:
The irony of Griselbrand is I actually don't see you drawing very many 'real' cards with him actually.  
  
He's a 7/7 lifelinker with evasion.   
  
You combo him out, and start attacking people to kill them. His pay life ability offers him protection because people DON'T want you to do that in response to a kill spell to 'replace' him.  
  
Alright, so in Commander, he's just tiny and it's a very different story: They WILL want to kill him, you WILL...get a load of other cards anyway...and they WILL....die anyway. But he's banned there now so that doesn't count, exactly.  
  
My speculation, admitting no experience on it, is that in Legacy/Vintage, where you have less life to pay AND less life you need to take to win, is that he probably races/kills pretty fast and even tho you draw the cards anyway 'because they're free and you can', you probably don't actually get a chance to use them much. Your deck can do other things sure, if it's comboing it wants at least two different things to combo out, bu... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
